name: @saekitominaga/customelements-tooltip-trigger
description: A custom element that triggers to call the tooltip UI.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.js -- brotlin compress dist/TooltipTrigger.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.js -- terser dist/TooltipTrigger.js -o dist/TooltipTrigger.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/TooltipTrigger.js.map',filename='TooltipTrigger.js',includeSources,url='TooltipTrigger.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/TooltipTrigger.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.d.ts -- cpy dist/TooltipTrigger.d.ts dist --rename=TooltipTrigger.min.d.ts
